meta.description: Thai Airways Royal Silk Lounge at Suvarnabhumi Airport (BKK), Concourse D. Learn more about the lounge: amenities, photos, review, opening hours, location.

lounge.name: Thai Airways Royal Silk Lounge

location.description: Bang Phli, Samut Prakan, Bangkok, Thailand

lounge.description: Royal Silk Lounges at Suvarnabhumi Airport incorporate the Thai Airways concept - service with flair, elegance, and gentleness. Enjoy a haven of luxurious amenities, including a premium buffet, shower facilities, and Wi-Fi.

reviews.content: As the main Thai airport this lounge is disappointing. Clean yes but too crowded and limited food not very good. Most other Star Alliance lounges at this airport are better.
Hot AF! Front desk checkin lady was super friendly and helpful. Curried chicken noodles very tasty! Good options for food but...So hot with no airflow... Decor looks 1979 installed in 1994.  Drudgy!
This is the biggest and best Thai lounge of flying business class. It’s a bit noisy since it’s not enclosed. You hear many boarding announcements and other noise. Food is low quality.
A little bit better than a basic lounge. Quite often crowded. Reasonably comfortable chairs. Pretty low food quality. No wine. Too few power outlets. Free wifi. Clean restrooms.
Clean showers and toilets, food was great. Nice way to spend 2 hours.
Not that bad as heard of but still - why does not Thai has an better lounge at their hub as Cathay have in HKG?
This is a large lounge, and at 11 pm it was near full capacity. As per other reviews the food and beverage is basic, but OK. My main issue was the lack of power outlets to charge devices.

Large lounge that spans the terminal walkway. Bar at the far end is decent as the bartender will mix drinks for you. Food is quite limited and poor in quality. Staff is friendly and attentive. Crowded.
Decent lounge, not too crowded at 11 am, pretty worn out and in need of a refresh.
Very large area, my visit was as it first opened at 5:15am today. There wasn't as many people on this Wednesday morning but easy to see how it can fill up quickly.
Overcrowded. Unhelpful staff.
Ummm, it's ok, I would say of your oneworld, Japan and Cathay offer a far better option. The hot food is very limited and it's white bread sandwiches with bad fillings, bar is okay.

Fairly average for home lounge. Clean restrooms & free average wifi. Decent food selection plus alcohol. Plenty of seating. 1 long lounge, kind of gloomy. Good to kill couple hours. Convenient to some gates.
Perfectly good lounge. Long and narrow, decent food options. Lobby bar is nice. Also connected to the first class lounge through a check in room between the two.

This is the best lounge in BKK for gold status/business flyer. Last year, it was very busy due to the fact that they allowed credit card benefit to enter this lounge. Now it's quite more comfortable but busy sometimes.
Located toward the east end of Level 3. Nice fresh salad selection and great Pad Thai. Lots of outlets available.
Wi-fi is paid? Nothing extra normal lounge.

Right after business class and fast track check in door 1 main entrance, so very busy as all pax drop in here. Biggest selection of food. But does not change much after all these years of traveling ??
The largest one. Plenty of seats but can still get very crowded during peak hours. Close to the spa but no showers available though.
Nice large lounge with plenty of food and drink options. Close to the Orchid Spa which is nice. Comfy chairs are plentiful. Fast Track security and passport control drop you right into this lounge.

This lounge can get crowded! There is a good self-serve drink fridge, liquor at the bar, fast WiFi, comfy chairs, kids' playroom, private computer rooms, and decent food. Travel Safely! ~ @travelblawg
This lounge offers a lot of publications in several languages. Good choice of snacks and drinks but could use a wider choice of wines. Gracious Thai service as well.
This is a nice lounge to spend time in, with lots of available seats and nice, hot food.
This is a larger lounge than the others at BKK. The service is standard to the other lounges'. With the plentiful food and clean setting, it's definitely a pleasure to be here.
